members.member: AprilTag Dictionary name from which markers will be detected.

The physical length of one side of a marker in meters. A higher localization accuracy may be obtained by specifying the marker size. This value is ignored if [member estimate_april_tag_length] is set to [code]true[/code].
If set to [code]true[/code] the detector will estimate the size of the marker.
